member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingCollection`1.MergeChanges(`0@,`0)

summary.para: Merge changed child items into the original trackable entity. This assumes GetChanges was called to update only changed items. Non-recursive - only direct children will be merged.

member.param: Local entity containing unchanged child items.
Entity returned by an update operation.

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingExtensions

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingExtensions.MergeChanges``1(TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingCollection{``0},``0[])

summary.para: Merge changes from a one or more updated entities into original entities.
First call GetChanges on the change tracker, passing changes to a service update operation.
Then call MergeChanges, passing one or more updated entities from the service update operation.
Properties on original entities will be set to those from updated entities.

member.param: Change tracker used to track changes on original entities
One or more entities updated with changes from a service update operation

exception.para: Update Trackable Entities Visual Studio Extension to v 2.0 or later, then re-generate client entities.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingExtensions.HasChanges(TrackableEntities.ITrackable)
member.summary: See if there are changes in an object graph.
member.returns: True if there are changes in the object graph

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingExtensions.Clone``1(TrackableEntities.Client.ChangeTrackingCollection{``0})

summary.para: Create a clone of the ChangeTrackingCollection using a JSON binary serializer.
Changes can be rolled back by reverting to the cloned ChangeTrackingCollection.

member.param: Change tracker used to track changes on entities

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Client.TrackableExtensions.SetTracking(TrackableEntities.ITrackable,System.Boolean,TrackableEntities.ITrackable)
member.summary: Recursively enable or disable tracking on trackable entities in an object graph.
